mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (username, category_id, amount, transaction_date, memo, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{categoryId}, #{amount}, #{transactionDate}, #{memo}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE transactions SET category_id = #{categoryId}, amount = #{amount}, transaction_date = #{transactionDate}, memo = #{memo}, created_at = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId};
